savedBooks.description: The C Programming Language is a computer programming book written by Brian Kernighan and Dennis Ritchie. It is the de facto standard for the C programming language.
savedBooks.title: The C Programming Language

savedBooks.description: Just for fun, I wrote a small program that generates random numbers. It is a simple program, but it is a good example of how to use the C programming language.
savedBooks.title: Random Number Generator

savedBooks.description: Ada Lovelace is considered the first computer programmer. She wrote the first algorithm intended for implementation on Charles Babbage's Analytical Engine.
savedBooks.title: Notes on the Analytical Engine
